Address.label: Address
Address.value: UNIT F,12/F KAISER ESTATE PHASE 1,41 MAN YUE STREET, HUNGHOM, Hong Kong

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: CTRL Group is an integrated marketing and advertising services provider in Hong Kong specializing in mobile games promotion for the local market. We provide services to mobile game developers, principally developers of mobile gaming applications that the gamers download from developer's websites and applicable mobile operation systems, such as Apple Store or Android Google Play Store. Although our clients are primarily from China and our advertising market is in Hong Kong, none of our business, operations or subsidiary is located in mainland China and the Company is not a Chinese operating company.
